menu.name: Grilled Chicken
menu.description: Juicy grilled chicken grilled to perfection with our special BBQ sauce, served with cilantro and lime.

menu.name: BBQ Ribs Complete Meal
menu.description: Tender BBQ ribs smoked to perfection glazed with our special BBQ sauce, served with baked potatoes, garlic bread, and pit style beans. A delicious meal!

menu.name: Bacon Wrapped Pork Tenderloin
menu.description: Juicy pork tenderloin wrapped smoked in crispy bacon and glazed with our special BBQ sauce.

menu.name: Hamburger & Hotdog Meal
menu.description: A delicious meal of our signature smoked hamburgers and hotdogs served with fries, and mushrooms.

menu.name: Wedding Cake
menu.description: A delicious wedding cake with layers of vanilla and chocolate cake, filled with our special buttercream frosting.

menu.name: Boston Market Sweet Potato Casserole
menu.description: A delicious sweet potato casserole with a buttery, cinnamon-sugar topping, perfect for any holiday meal.

menu.name: Tacos del camar√≥n
menu.description: Delicious shrimp tacos with salsa roja, grilled onions, mexican crema, fire roasted peppers and corn, along with cilantro and lime.

menu.name: Chicken Enchiladas
menu.description: Tender chicken enchiladas filled with seasoned chicken, cheese, and green chilies, served with rice and beans.

menu.name: Tacos al Pastor
menu.description: Perfected pork tacos marinated in a blend of spices and pineapple, white onion, cilantro, and lime. Our co-owner's favorite taco when he served his mission in Mexico! He knows the flavor, and he perfected it like a real taquero!
